html:
11.28.17  3:16 pm   has any one ever tried to steal your will to live?

     no

11.28.17  2:34 pm   how do i start an incredibly undesirable task that is quickly approaching the deadline? how do i get motivated?

     it's very important to know exactly what the first step would be, and exactly how to do the first part of the first step. you may think you know generally what to do, but i think if you figure out even more specifically exactly what you need to physically do to physically start on the first part of that first step, i think you may find yourself automatically doing it as soon as you figure it out

11.28.17  1:03 pm   Not to be rude, I love your music and vids so much, and I don't question how hard you work on your content.. but do you think the biweekly schedule is humanly possible?

     it depends on the size and nature of the videos, but i will keep trying

      I don't know anything about making videos, but is there something in particular that makes that hard to do?

     you'll have to try it and see

      Like, is the most time consuming aspect come from the creative side of things, as in figuring out exactly how you want all the animations and graphics and stuff to look? Or is it more time consuming to actually make the thing, like is there a lot of reptitive, time-consuming, 'busy work' that goes into making a video? 

     the entire process takes time. the only way to really get a feel for it is to try doing it. surely everyone does it differently

11.28.17  12:32 pm   How do you tell whether something is postmodern or just bad

     i don't understand what the word postmodern is supposed to mean. something seems impossible about that but i can't put my finger on it

11.28.17  12:31 pm   Can you do any fancy drumstick twirling tricks?

     yes

11.28.17  12:22 pm   what's your favorite music game?

     making music in a slightly different way than you've ever heard before

11.28.17  9:30 am   Do you still have a patreon

     yes

11.28.17  9:20 am   how long is the new video you're making

     about 3 minutes and 10 seconds

11.28.17  4:57 am   Are you an umbrella that searches to appear like a human or are you a human that can become an umbrella?

     no

11.28.17  4:20 am   Who's the best musician of the past 10,000 years?

     it's not a contest

11.28.17  3:59 am   How can I start to feel better?

     take on some new and interesting challenges

11.28.17  3:46 am   do doors have a special meaning in your life?

     yes

11.28.17  3:36 am   What happens if I accidentally block myself on social media?

     you win a prize

11.28.17  2:41 am   hey i tried to rent a soap at a supermarket but i got kicked out instead, what do you think?

     they should have let you keep shopping, for things to purchase

11.28.17  2:36 am   May I lick your music

     sure

11.28.17  1:35 am   what kind of cat makes the best bread? asking for a friend

     despite what you see on TV, a cat's bread making skills has nothing to do with race

11.28.17  12:45 am   Who was the last person of great importance you met?

     you

11.28.17  12:09 am   opinion on bohemian rhapsody?

     actually i have an interesting story about that song. i had never heard it until one time i was at a large music festival (i don't remember how i ended up there) and a band (i think a famous band, perhaps the flaming lips, maybe someone else, i'm not sure) was playing that song and they had an animated lyric video playing behind them. it was the first time i had ever heard that song, and i had no idea if it was an original or a cover or what, but the point i'm trying to make is they had an animated lyric video playing, and all the lyrics were precisely timed with the music and it was very thrilling, especially considering the already thrilling nature of that song. i think seeing that video with that song might have had a deep influence on me, and really showed me the power of using lyrics dramatically on screen with good timing

11.27.17  11:08 pm   did u get corporal punishment as a child? any thoughts on it?

     i don't know what it is, so probably not

11.27.17  10:35 pm    I know it sounds cliche but will you ever make a video thanking your viewers?

     i think i have done that before

11.27.17  9:28 pm   How do I deal with the stress of moving?

     go for a long walk

11.27.17  9:23 pm   Anee friend making tactics?

     start a business

11.27.17  9:00 pm   what is the cure for hiccups?

     newer, better hiccups
11.27.17  8:56 pm   How do you pronounce "Bill Wurtz"?

11.27.17  8:51 pm   how do you remain so optimistic most of the time?

     i dropped myself on my head when i was young

11.27.17  8:17 pm   How do I stop being such a lazy god damn fucking bitchass douche ho shitbag cocksucking dickfaced twat?

     how did you start

11.27.17  8:14 pm   How do you feel about musical theatre?

     i'd say music is a great asset to any theatre

11.27.17  8:07 pm   What's the best combo?

     pomp and circumstance

11.27.17  8:03 pm   im losing control of my life, and i would love some advice from a sane person, like you

     oh good, you came to the right place, welcome to i am sane, dot com

11.27.17  8:03 pm   do you think it's fair to say that psychedelics have a place as a genuine creative tool

     yes

11.27.17  7:52 pm   How far away is London?

     too far

11.27.17  7:47 pm   In all seriousness, how do I find the groove? 

     you have to let it find you. that is the only way

11.27.17  7:25 pm   i never get stuff on christmas, any ideas on how to get stuff?

     have you considered giving stuff

11.27.17  6:45 pm   Where is my hippo!

     where did you last have it

11.27.17  5:50 pm   Is part of the soap tips video a statement on American capitalism?

     i doubt it. although i haven't seen the video since i finished it so i don't really remember

11.27.17  4:41 pm   Do you like turtles or elephants?

     they are ok

11.27.17  4:14 pm   How can I tell the difference between right and left?

     write something and see which direction the writing is going. that's 'right'

11.27.17  4:08 pm   are you planning to make videos for some of your older songs

     yes

11.27.17  3:42 pm   hello, is this MONICA? Lewinsky.

     no

11.27.17  3:40 pm   I didn't know the cactuses with the really small, thin thorns were also really sharp and could get stuck in my hand!!! Why did you not tell me this Bill!!!?!? 

     i didn't know you were going to play with one

11.27.17  3:22 pm   Why are almost all your videos low effort shitposts?

     if they are low effort then why the hell do i spend so much time working on them

11.27.17  2:34 pm   What's a dude ranch?

     i'm not sure

11.27.17  2:15 pm   are you good at hangman?

     yes

11.27.17  2:12 pm   so why did the last resident of your place leave up their decorations?

     i don't know

     did they die?

     i don't know

     did they have to gtfo stat?

     i don't know

11.27.17  1:44 pm   Do you have a Twitch profile?

     yes

11.27.17  1:43 pm   whens the video coming out?

     as soon as i finish it

11.27.17  1:08 pm   how do i get good at music?

     do it more

     perhaps it is ghost toast

11.27.17  11:16 am   How do you feel about people constantly taking your lyrics and quoting them in other contexts?

     seems legit

11.27.17  11:14 am   is music itself your mentor?

     yes

     or are you your own mentor?

     yes
